headline: Starboard Value pushes Becton Dickinson to sell life sciences unit, FT reports
summary: Activist investor Starboard Value has taken a stake in Becton Dickinson and is pushing the medical technology company to sell its life sciences unit, the Financial Times reported on Monday. ...
